data.eml:eml: Comparative description of the Mediterranean erigonine spider Diplocephalus guidoi n. sp. (Araneae, Linyphiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Frick, Holger, Isaia, Marco (2012): Comparative description of the Mediterranean erigonine spider Diplocephalus guidoi n. sp. (Araneae, Linyphiidae). Zootaxa 3475: 65-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.213920
